title: Atlas Anchor Record
description: Derived metro anchor metadata emitted by the Atlas CLI anchors command.

anchor_id.description: Stable identifier assigned to the anchor cluster.

cluster_label.description: Cluster label produced by the underlying DBSCAN/HDBSCAN algorithm (noise = -1).

centroid_lat.description: Latitude for the anchor centroid in decimal degrees.

centroid_lon.description: Longitude for the anchor centroid in decimal degrees.

store_count.description: Number of stores assigned to the anchor.

store_ids.description: Store identifiers assigned to the anchor cluster.
